attributes.action: To Go To The House Of Commons And Apologize For Misleading The Country Over MOD Cuts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it alarming  that Gordon Brown  has not been to to House Of Commons to Apologise for misleading the Whole Country about Cuts to the Defence Budgets,  Not Only has the PM misled the Country but also his own Ministers, when they have been asked questions in the past about defence spending because they all repeated what the PM said. Its like none of these Questions existed.
Ex Generals were ridiculed in The  HOC for daring to speak out
